factual: What does Article 7 specify about the application of laws effective at the same time as a crime was committed?
scenario_based: If someone commits a crime on January 1st, and there is a new law passed that day with harsher penalties, can they be punished under both the old and new laws?
advice_seeking: As an individual who has been charged with a crime, what steps should I take to understand how this law might affect my case?
